data.message: hay, I'm interested in why my every post is spam, I'm publishing my second-hand clothes to the groups for which they are intended

replies.message: Hey Petra. Thanks for reaching out. You may have been blocked from posting because you used a feature in a way that could be considered abusive, even if you didn't mean to. For example, posting a lot of items in a short period of time could result in a block. Blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days. Please sit tight while the ban is in place. For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/2yYvuRm. If you believe you were blocked by mistake, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2AHMnNJ. -Tenaya
hay thanks for the explanations, within 10 days they blocked me 2x and I wrote the answer,
